name: hetzner-cloud-js-ts-wrapper
description: A wrapper for the Hetzner-Cloud API written Typescript

scripts.prepack: cp package.json dist & cp .npmignore dist & cp README.md dist & rm -rf dist/dist
scripts.postpack: cd dist & del package.json & del .npmignore & del README.md

author: Michael Steinmoetzger (ShortPing)
